creator.description:
You can use this labeler to hide US politics, including by topic or politician. For your sanity and mental health. Ran by @halsco.de.

We are now live and active. See pinned post for policy.

locales.description: Actions of the US military or National Guards, at home or abroad. May be violent or gory. Military aid that isn't "boots on the ground", i.e. sending arms, fall under the foreign relations label.
locales.name: US Military

locales.description: United States diplomacy, support, condemnations, etc of foreign nations, the United Nations, the European Union, or similar foreign entities.
locales.name: Foreign Relations with the US

locales.description: Posts about politics in the United States which do not conform to any other category.
locales.name: Uncategorized US political post

locales.description: Catch-all for posts about or quoting Democratic politicians.
locales.name: Democrats

locales.description: Posts about any government elections occurring within the United States, including the presidential, gubernatorial, general, midterm, federal, state, county, and municipal elections.
locales.name: US Elections

locales.description: Catch-all for posts about or quoting Republican politicians.
locales.name: Republicans

locales.description: About LGBTQ+ politics, policies, and laws in the US.
locales.name: US LGBTQ+ politics

locales.description: Content that talks about the 2024 presidential candidate for the Democratic party.
locales.name: Kamala Harris

locales.description: Anything talking about this former president of the United States.
locales.name: Donald Trump
